title: Athletism — Tennis (Elite) — Phase 10: Peak & Performance Maintenance
equipment: Gym: rack, barbells, dumbbells, cables, landmine
goal: Express fitness on match days; micro‑dose intensity; keep CNS sharp.

warmup: Mobility 8–10' (ankle DF, hips, T‑spine, shoulder IR/ER)
Activation 6–8' (glute med, deep core, scapular control)
Footwork prep: pogos, carioca, lateral skips, crossover steps
main: Primer: 3x(45'' high‑tempo footwork / 2' easy) + 3x5 MB throws
Short power: 3x2 clean pulls (light) + jump squats 3x3
On‑court: 2–3 short live games @race/match cadence; stop fresh

notes: Week 1: one rehearsal + one primer. Week 2: taper window 48–72h pre‑match.
